website_summaries.verdict: The best boot for electricians since it meets electrical hazard shock resistance standards.
pros: Long 14-hour shifts are not a problem in these shoes, which have a shock-absorbing foot bed
The full-grain leather with a comfortable, breathable lining helps keep feet from overheating
A steel toe gives full protection
Non-marking and slip-resistant makes it suitable for most workplaces
cons: Due to the steel toe, they are heavy

customer_reviews.title: ... matter what I bought they weren't going to be comfortable. I didn't feel comfortable with a whole size ...
customer_reviews.text: Everyone told me to buy 1 size larger when I purchased steel toed shoes and no matter what I bought they weren't going to be comfortable. I didn't feel comfortable with a whole size larger so I bought 1/2 size larger and they are perfect! I read a lot of reviews before picking these shoes and I'm glad I did. These got the most raves for being comfortable and after wearing them for 12 hours the first day my feet thanked me! They're also very stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Totally Happy
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, wonderful, great! I worked a 14 hour shift in these amazing shoes. I am a nurse and am on my feet all day. I have another pair of shoes from this company and like them very much, but these are even better. I'm thinking about getting a pair in black. I was a little weary of buying these because they have a steel toe and other comments mentioned they rub on the ankle. I found neither to be a problem. These shoes are so comfortable, I actually fell asleep in them. When I woke up, my feet still felt fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Not made for long hours
customer_reviews.text: When I first got them I thought they would be great but after 9 hours on my feet and then 10 hours a day after I was seriously in some pain!! Had to switch back to old work shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are comfortable even when working 12 hours
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th pair of these. I buy a new pair of safety shoes every year. I had the Timberland Pros last year and they don't hold up nearly as well. They hold up well. I work in an automotive factory and am in oil, coolant & metal chips constantly. These are comfortable even when working 12 hours. I order a size up just because of the steel toe.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes because they are made in USA. They are comfortable. However, I have to return them because for some reasons, the left side of the left shoe keeps rubbing the lower part of my ankle and gets uncomfortable pretty quick. Probably it's just my strange foot anatomy :-) The right shoe is okay. Enough cushion in the insole. I like the safety features too. However, a little bit more arch support will be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great shoes just not with hammer toes
customer_reviews.text: Not problem with shoes but my hammer toes and steel toes meet exactly at edge-ouch I have tried to find descent work shoes for women in wide-too no avail these would have been perfect without the steel-still looking
customer_reviews.author: S. Quinn

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are wonderful! I am on my feet all day long ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are wonderful! I am on my feet all day long on hard concrete floors and these shoes have helped my feet from hurting as much as they had been. I love that they are made in the USA, and they are very well made. They are made to last.
customer_reviews.author: Yipee

customer_reviews.title: Super heavy, I own a pair of Timberland Pros ...
customer_reviews.text: Super heavy, I own a pair of Timberland Pros boots and these are at least twice the weight, also come much darker than pictured. They look beautiful but felt like wearing concrete bricks.
customer_reviews.author: kristy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHOES
customer_reviews.text: Well made shoes. Great fit, steal toe. Couldn’t keep them because my job has a metal detector to get in.
customer_reviews.author: JBH

customer_reviews.title: I love the office casual design
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were as expected. I love the office casual design. These shoes were very comfortable, and appear to be made of quality leather.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa D. McChristian

customer_reviews.title: Met my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoes except for around my ankles but i think that is just how new shoes are. Would highly recommend these over Sketcher steel toes any day.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Worth renewing
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes I wore this pair out must order a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work shoes
customer_reviews.text: These safety shoes fit very well. I like that they are not so heavy also. They don't make my feet feel so huge as wearing boots.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: I did not know it was like that, can be my
customer_reviews.text: to heavy, I did not know it was like that, can be my mistake
customer_reviews.author: zayuc

product_meta.title: Thorogood Women's American Heritage Double Track Safety Toe Oxford
product_meta.description:
When you've got work to do, you need footwear you can trust. This Double Track oxford features a full-grain leather upper with sharp contrasting stitching and a steel toe for protection, while its comfort-weave lining and dual-density Shock Zone footbed will keep you cool and supported, hour after hour. Its non-marking, slip-resistant dual-density outsole ensures secure stepping no matter your environment. This boot has been tested for and meets the CAN/CSA-Z195 18,000-volt electrical shock resistance standard.

Since 1892, Weinbrenner Shoe Company has been a leading manufacturer and pioneering force in the American footwear industry, initiating many of the significant safety and job-fitted design elements that are common today. Thorogood footwear is the most trusted brand in the uniform and work industry. All Thorogood American Heritage Work and American Uniform styles are Union-Made in the USA. Their local union has been a proud part of the Weinbrenner Shoe Co. since 1943.
feature_bullets: Meets CAN/CSA-Z195 18,000 Volts Electrical Shock Resistance Standard
